website_summaries.verdict: A highly visible pair of gloves fortified with many features designed to protect your hands.
pros: These Seibertron gloves are manufactured with an abrasion-resistant synthetic leather that helps protect the palm
The beaded texture offers increased grip while the impact absorbent material that covers the fingers and back of the hand can provide increased protection
cons: The biggest issue with these gloves is that they run a little small, so when ordering, consider sizing up

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pulling Trash!!!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have everything but infinity stones!!! I'm Creek Runner 242 and I pull trash from local creeks and these are my gloves of choice because I never know what I'm going to run into! With these gloves I pull out carpet, mattresses, broken glass, you name it these gloves take care of it! They are about as heavy duty of a glove as they come and make me feel safe while pulling trash!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Eades

customer_reviews.title: Small is not small. It's a Men's Medium
customer_reviews.text: Sizing guide is crap. I'd really like to like these gloves. They meet the EN388 standards and I like the look... but they were way bigger than expected. Too huge to be of any use! I had ~1 inch extra in the fingertips. I'd need an extra extra extra small, based on the way these fit. Make sure you have big hands, and consider buying a smaller size than the chart recommends.
customer_reviews.author: funnyladyMars

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I work part time at my local race track on the track safety team as an EMT. I bought these gloves to protect my hands when I go up to a car to check on the driver. These aren't fire gloves, but they do protect my hands. So far I haven't had any issues with them. The high visibility color helps my teammates see my hands if were in smoke. Something beneficial if were pulling a driver out as we need to see our partner's hands. While I don't use these for patient care, if I happen to get blood on them the color lets me see it so I can toss them. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: techguru

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: I work in plastics recycling and the gloves they give us at work are cheap and I burn through a pair or two a week so I've been looking for better gloves to suit my needs. I really like these ones, they lasted me 3-4 months so far before the middle fingers of both hands split open at the tip. Both hands at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Solid work gloves, ordered a second pair
customer_reviews.text: There are pretty solid gloves. I abused them for over a year and they finally developed a whole in the end of one of the fingers. In all honesty you could probably keep using them for 95% of applications. The rubber armor on the back side is actually very effective at preventing trauma as well. Decent dexterity and great fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schellberg

customer_reviews.title: Great forepaws!
customer_reviews.text: Been trimming bushes and trees around my property and these gloves are amazing! Durable, protective, dexterous, and comfortable for chainsawing, hauling, and tossing branches, brush, and logs. Very happy with them. 🤠
customer_reviews.author: Jace11

customer_reviews.title: Most durable gloves I've used to date
customer_reviews.text: These are the most durable gloves I have used to date! I run a sawmill company and was able to grab onto a stuck bandsaw blade and put my whole weight into pulling on the blade and these things don't even look like they have been scratched. I'll be buying a few more of these for sure. The gloves are slightly tight around the wrist area when you go to get your hand in but they feel great after your hand is fully inserted. I haven't tested the impact resistance yet but I'd rather put that off for as long as possible =)
customer_reviews.author: Justin McMinds

customer_reviews.title: You can not get them on
customer_reviews.text: The cuff's are at least two sizes to small. You can not get them on. With help I was able to force them on, the glove body is a XXL, the cuff L.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: These are the same gloves at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Ironclads that I needed to replace. These are the same glove at half the price. Very tough gloves. Using them to clear out brush, tree removal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great, very durable, love the looks. I am very hard on gloves as I handle steel regularly at work. It's been three weeks, and not one sign of wear. ( I usually get 2-3 weeks out of gloves) Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use them to work on my car, split and stack wood, and general yard work. I’ve had them about a year without any seam splits and very little wear. I plan to buy another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product Size does come slightly larger than expected so bare in mind
customer_reviews.author: MR T DEXTER

customer_reviews.title: Not tough enough for the oil field
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands and the gloves tear between my thumb and index finger. That area needs to be reinforced with heavy duty material and stitching
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have had these gloves for 3 months and they are still holding up good first pair I've owned that has held up this long
customer_reviews.author: Adam w Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for mining!!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. I do hobby mining and needed gloves to protect my hands and manicure while moving rocks. These did the job. No cuts, calluses, or chipped nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Needs leather
customer_reviews.text: Don't attempt any sort of grinding on hot work near them. Melted straight through to my hands while grinding some steel bar.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gloves durable as well. I will buy again. I haul equipment and handle chains and binders all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Wiggles

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. Saved my fingers from some accidents. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very good glove I had to get a size down from what I normally get and I got lots of help from the company
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: These gloclvesbare great. Great shock absorbers for your hands and confertable
customer_reviews.text: These gloclvesbare great. Great shock absorbers for your hands and confertable. And i like the fact that they are a bright color. When on the scene ooerating tools people might not see your fingers or hand.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best work gloves I've ever had in 39 years of construction. 😎
customer_reviews.author: Trenton buzzsaw

customer_reviews.title: They fit!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for my boyfriend who has a hard time finding gloves that fit his long fingers. They fit him perfectly! He said they’re durable and feel great. He hasn’t had any problems with them and is going to order a second pair so he can have a back up just in case. Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: Poumate1884

customer_reviews.title: Good working gloves CUT5
customer_reviews.text: Very good , fits well and easy to work with it. Good price and CUT5 standard. Give you good grip and resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Ernani V.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great work gloves but run a little big in size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott l.

customer_reviews.title: and these are the best and only gloves he orders
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered these twice for my husband, who works in the oilfield, oil drilling platform. He does hard work in Alaska, on a offshore drilling rig, and these are the best and only gloves he orders. They are meant for the oilfield, rugged, and very tough, durable, protect his hands, thick, made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made gloves...just did not fit me, too tight in the palm...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made gloves and they do the job when using chainsaw!!!
customer_reviews.author: David P Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good and durable gloves will be buying more when the pair I have now wear out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Kongs
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kongs, now I can have the great features at a better price. The high vis feature is perfect for crane guiding ops and the knuckle protection is excellent when handling shackles and other rigging. Very comfortable and easy to get on without being too loose or tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Russell

customer_reviews.title: These are well made professional quality gloves with amazing protection for finger joints
customer_reviews.text: These are well made professional quality gloves with amazing protection for finger joints, wrist and the hand as a whole. If you work with heavy items (automotive), large diameter piping work w/ wrenches and/or working/trimming large trees where there are dangers lurking to scratch up and smash up your delicate hands + fingers you need these gloves... They will protect you and keep you on the job!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R R Esq

customer_reviews.title: Descent gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for someone who needs gloves that can withstand handling cardboard boxes all day (opening them, breaking them down and moving boxes around) I believe these lasted him about 3 weeks before breaking down. This is a little below average amount of time compared to other gloves. Definitely a colder weather glove, they keep your hands hot.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: The fit is small. Definitely have to order one ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is small. Definitely have to order one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: HERMAN E WEBB

customer_reviews.title: I really think they are cool looking!
customer_reviews.text: These are going to be my motorcycle gloves this spring. I really think they are cool looking!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: on the whole durable and nice stitches, but some spot is so thin to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not so Hardness than I expected, on the whole durable and nice stitches, but some spot is so thin to wear for grinding work. just as good as price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid these
customer_reviews.text: Every time i use these gloves, blisters are always an issue between thumb and forefinger after about 15 minutes of use. Its caused by the stitching of fabric in between the palm and fingers. Poorly made. As for vibration resistant, they are terrible and thats just using a gas powered weed whacker.
customer_reviews.author: M. F

product_meta.title: Seibertron High-Vis SDX2 Resistant Reducing Anti-Impact Mechanics Heavy Duty Safety Rescue Gloves CE EN388 4232 XL
product_meta.description:
Size:SDX2-XL
1.Reflective tape on the wrist and high visible color provides high visibility and safety during daytime and night working. 
2. Multiple 3D TPR rubber design of hand back provide maximum protective area up to 90% which greatly maximize its anti-impact ability to the external kinetic energy. 
3.Palm Dual Kevlar threads (cut resistant) stitching provides better abrasion resistant ability and longer service life than normal Nylon. 
4.Super abrasion resistant palm material with PVC anti-slip dots and Teflon water resistant process make it highly abrasion resistant while providing excellent anti-slip and water&Oil resistant ability. 
5.Extra slots on TPR fingers protection provide excellent fingers bending dexterity 
6.One-piece material on the palm increase cut resistant ability from level 1 to level 2 (Refer to CE Rate) 
7.Cuff puller design on the wrist helps to wear your glove in the proper position faster.
feature_bullets: Choose the size by the left size chart image
Exclusive Palm Material 25% more abrasion resistant than normal synthetic leather
Patent Pending Finger Protection 76.4% impact absorption offers sidewall and complete fingertip protection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
